text: Edward Schultz (January 27, 1954 - July 5, 2018) was an American television and radio host. His shows are about liberal politics. He had been a conservative before becoming liberal. He hosts The Ed Show on MSNBC and Ed Schultz Show on the radio. He was born in Norfolk, Virginia. He hosted at many local stations in Fargo, North Dakota and its nearby areas. In the 2016 presidential election, Schultz endorsed U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders for President of the United States. Schultz died on July 5, 2018 in Washington, D.C., aged 64. ==References== Category:American radio personalities Category:American television personalities Category:American political commentators Category:Television talk show hosts Category:American progressives Category:People from Norfolk, Virginia Category:1954 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Ed Schultz
